name: Corona Grocery Dash
description:
Given the world event of the COVID-19 pandemic happening, I figured I would make a game to remind people to stock up on groceries, keep your distance, and quarantine. Make yourself even more paranoid with this little game while you become a couch potato during your home quarantine. Stay safe out there!

CONTROLS:

WASD to Move

Hold down LMB to grab cart and hold it

Hold down RMB to look in mouse direction

E to Pick up items and place them in cart

LEFT SHIFT to sprint while not holding cart
